text: Pharmasave Drugs (National) Ltd. is a Canadian chain of pharmacies. They are headquartered in Langley, British Columbia. They have 900 store locations all across Canada and are independent. In September 1981, United Pharmacy and Western Drug Mart both merged together to create the Pharmasave chain. On March 1st, 2023, Ivan Guillen was named as the new Chief Executive Officer of Pharmasave Drugs. On May 22, 2024, Air Miles announced that they had signed a deal for Pharmasave to become the exclusive pharmacy partner for the rewards program in Canada. On September 14, 2023, the ownership of the Pharmasave store in Fort Frances, Ontario was purchased and taken over by Shoppers Drug Mart. == References == ==Other website== * Category:1981 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in British Columbia Category:Pharmacies of Canada
